dcterms:description: The StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC) is a benchmark for evaluating multi-agent reinforcement learning algorithms, featuring various maps with different levels of difficulty, allowing for direct comparison of algorithms based on their win rates.
dcterms:title: StarCraft Multi-Agent Challenge (SMAC)

dcterms:description: A custom coordination game designed for experiments in this paper, where agents must coordinate their actions to reach advantageous states.
dcterms:title: Coordination Game
